name: Soiled LDjam 52
description:
Web version Issues

does not work on firefox and Mac, can be a bit jittery or lag the browser. It's better to use the download. Godot4 does not really support the web export yet :/

Controls:

WASD/Arrows: move, climb, drop through
Space: Jump
Shift: Sprint
LMB: pick up (when near seeds, soil or ready planter boxes)
also LMB: throw (and hope you don't miss)

Credits:

Tileset greatly improved by Bucket Face, thanks a lot!
Rest done by me
